I tried running all of the demos to check out a new install on Windows 
XP.=
  File demo_cvCJ.py gives the following error:  "Microsoft Visual 
C++ Runt=
ime Library, Runtime Error!, Program C:\Python25\pythonw.exe, 
This applica=
tion has requested the Runtime to terminate in an unusual 
way."  Only the =
two cv demos produce this error.  All other demos run 
normally.  The error=
 occurs on both of my XP PCs.
